features: 100% recycled polyester fleece hoody with a sweater-knit face and a brushed back; 100% recycled polyester fleece side panels with a smooth face and a brushed back
Center-front zipper extends to the chin for warmth and protection against the elements and the comfortable multipanel hood seals in your heat
Two welted, zippered handwarmer pockets; two vertical, zippered chest pockets
Spandex binding at hem, cuffs and hood seals out cold air and rests comfortably on the skin
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
